field.name: fusion_item_subtext
field.label: Subtext Line
field.description: You can put a second line here

field.name: fusion_customclass
field.label: Custom CSS Class
field.description: A Custom CSS class that can be assigned to this item

field.name: fusion_columns
field.label: Columns of Child Items
field.description: How many columns should display for children of this menu item

field.name: fusion_distribution
field.label: Item Distribution
field.description: You can choose to distribute child items 'evenly', 'in-order' or 'manually'. For example, 7 items in 3 columns distributed evenly is: 3,2,2, in order it's 3,3,1

field.name: fusion_manual_distribution
field.label: Manual Item Distribution
field.description: comma seperated count of rows in each column, eg: 4, 2, 3

field.name: fusion_dropdown_width
field.label: Drop-Down Width (px)
field.description: width of any dropdown column in px, eg: 400

field.name: fusion_children_group
field.label: Group Child Items
field.description: Select this to group children under menu item rather than treating as a submenu

field.name: fusion_children_type
field.label: Child Item Type
field.description: Select this to group children under menu item rather than treating as a submenu
